name: sys::personality::dwarf::DwarfReader::read_uleb128

sys::personality::dwarf::DwarfReader::re.doc:
Read a type T and then bump the pointer by that amount.

 DWARF streams are "packed", so all types must be read at align 1.

doc: ULEB128 and SLEB128 encodings are defined in Section 7.6 - "Variable Length Data".
